ComicInfo.Title: A Tribute to Steven Hughes
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Tribute to Seven Hughes is collection of artworks inspired by the drawings of Chaos Comics senior comic book artist. His designs and drawing shaped the characters of Lady Death, Evil Ernie and countless more.
This issue has contributions by dozens of his peers who created original artworks based on the character he helped to form and make famous.
